person.note: Chen(1) Ziming [10015] Author of the Fu ren da quan lang fang, 24 ch. with self preface in 1237 (Ding Fubao, 412a-412b) (Guest call number C98/1446), another work with self preface in 1263 (ibid., 393b). He held the office as Jianfu Yixue jiaoshou (Meidcal Instructor) when the first work was published (SKTY, 103.11a [Vol. 3, p. 2108]). A third work is the Guan jian lang fang (Guest call number C63/522). In 04/02/1222, he was demoted one seniority rank (zi) and dismissed from a new post (See SHY:ZG, 75.30b for details).From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1222: demoted one seniority rank (zi) and dismissed from new post.1199: As Guangdong tixing, made detailed prosposal for creation of Guangdong hospitals (see Documentation)
